title: A random book from the shelves: My Absolute Darling by Gabriel Tallent - file under disturbing books
Occult Detective October! Mystery and horror combine for a fantastic new reading event!
summary:
Find links to every where you can connect with me here: https://linktr.ee/criminolly
_____
The weekly prompts:
Week 1: classic - pre-1960s
Week 2: modern - post 1960s
Week 3: diverse author or main character
Week 4: anything goes
